AT.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
AT.description: Entdecke die Ursprünge der Fire-Emblem Saga! Fordere in der Rolle des jungen Helden Marth dein gestohlenes Heimatland zurück und rette deine Schwester aus den bösen Klauen des Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon ist ein erweitertes Nintendo DS™ Remake des Originals Fire Emblem für Famicom™, das ursprünglich nur in Japan erhältlich war. Baue eine Armee auf und schmiede Pläne und Strategien, um in rundenbasierten Kämpfen deinen Gegner zu schlagen. Ziehe hierbei das Terrain und die Einheitsstärken und -schwächen in Betracht. Werde eine lebende Legende, rette das Königreich und die Zukunft deiner Familie!

AU.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
AU.description: Discover the origins of the Fire Emblem saga! As young hero Marth, you must reclaim your stolen homeland and save your sister from the evil forces of Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. Become a living legend, save the kingdom and your family’s future!

BG.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
BG.description: Discover the origins of the Fire Emblem saga! As young hero Marth, you must reclaim your stolen homeland and save your sister from the evil forces of Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. Become a living legend, save the kingdom and your family’s future!

BE.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
BE.description: Découvrez les origines de la saga Fire Emblem ! Dans la peau du jeune héros Marth, vous devez récupérer votre terre natale volée et sauver votre sœur des forces diaboliques de Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon est un remake amélioré pour Nintendo DS™ de l'original Fire Emblem pour Famicom™, jusqu'alors paru uniquement au Japon. Rassemblez une armée et préparez votre stratégie dans des batailles à tour de rôle, en prenant en compte le terrain, les forces et faiblesses de chaque unité, afin de vaincre les forces ennemies. Devenez une légende vivante, sauvez le royaume et le futur de votre famille !

CH.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
CH.description: Entdecke die Ursprünge der Fire-Emblem Saga! Fordere in der Rolle des jungen Helden Marth dein gestohlenes Heimatland zurück und rette deine Schwester aus den bösen Klauen des Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon ist ein erweitertes Nintendo DS™ Remake des Originals Fire Emblem für Famicom™, das ursprünglich nur in Japan erhältlich war. Baue eine Armee auf und schmiede Pläne und Strategien, um in rundenbasierten Kämpfen deinen Gegner zu schlagen. Ziehe hierbei das Terrain und die Einheitsstärken und -schwächen in Betracht. Werde eine lebende Legende, rette das Königreich und die Zukunft deiner Familie!

Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. ES.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
ES.description: ¡Descubre los orígenes de la saga Fire Emblem! Ponte en la piel del joven héroe Marth para recuperar la tierra natal que te han arrebatado y salva a tu hermana de las fuerzas malignas de Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon es una nueva versión mejorada para Nintendo DS™ del juego original Fire Emblem para Famicom™, que hasta entonces solo se había publicado en Japón. Reúne un ejército y prepara tu estrategia en los combates por turnos, teniendo en cuenta el terreno y los puntos fuertes y débiles de las unidades, para vencer a las fuerzas enemigas. ¡Conviértete en una leyenda viviente, salva el reino y el futuro de tu familia!

Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. Become a living legend, save the kingdom and your family’s future!

Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon est un remake amélioré pour Nintendo DS™ de l'original Fire Emblem pour Famicom™, jusqu'alors paru uniquement au Japon. Rassemblez une armée et préparez votre stratégie dans des batailles à tour de rôle, en prenant en compte le terrain, les forces et faiblesses de chaque unité, afin de vaincre les forces ennemies. IT.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
IT.description: Scopri le origini della saga Fire Emblem! Giocherai nei panni di Marth, un giovane eroe pronto a reclamare la terra che gli è stata rubata e a salvare sua sorella dalle forze malvagie di Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon è un remake migliorato per Nintendo DS™ del gioco originale Fire Emblem per Famicom™, pubblicato solo in Giappone. Crea un'armata, pianifica la tua strategia nelle battaglie a turni, tenendo presente sia il terreno sia i punti forti e deboli dell'unità per sconfiggere le forze nemiche. Diventa una leggenda vivente, salva il regno e il futuro della tua famiglia!

Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. NL.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
NL.description: Ontdek de oorsprong van de Fire Emblem-serie! Als de jonge held Marth is het aan jou om je gestolen thuisland te heroveren en je zus te redden van de kwaadaardige krachten van Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is een verbeterde Nintendo DS™-versie van de originele Fire Emblem voor de Famicom™, die voorheen alleen in Japan was uitgebracht. Stel een leger samen en plan je strategie in turn-based gevechten, waarbij je rekening moet houden met het terrein, en de sterktes en zwaktes van eenheden, om de vijandelijke troepen te verslaan. Wordt een levende legende, red het koninkrijk en de toekomst van je familie!

NZ.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
NZ.description: Discover the origins of the Fire Emblem saga! As young hero Marth, you must reclaim your stolen homeland and save your sister from the evil forces of Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. Become a living legend, save the kingdom and your family’s future!

PL.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
PL.description: Discover the origins of the Fire Emblem saga! As young hero Marth, you must reclaim your stolen homeland and save your sister from the evil forces of Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces. Become a living legend, save the kingdom and your family’s future!

PT.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
PT.description: Descobre as origens da saga de Fire Emblem! Como o jovem herói Marth, terás de reconquistar as terras que te foram roubadas e salvar a tua irmã das forças malvadas de Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon é um remake para a Nintendo DS™ do Fire Emblem original para a Famicom™, lançado apenas no Japão. Reúne um exército e planeia a tua estratégia em batalhas por turnos, tendo em consideração o terreno, as vantagens e as fraquezas das unidades para derrotares as forças inimigas. Torna-te numa lenda viva, salva o reino e o futuro da tua família!

RU.name: Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon
RU.description: Узнайте как начиналась сага Fire Emblem! В роли юного героя Марта, вам придется освободить родину и спасти вашу сестру от зловещих сил Медеуса. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon - это улучшенная Nintendo DS™ версия оригинальной игры Fire Emblem для Famicom™, в прошлом доступной только в Японии. Создавайте армию и планируйте вашу стратегию боя, чтобы победить врага в этой пошаговой игре, принимая во внимание особенности местности, а также сильные и слабые стороны боевых единиц. Станьте живой легендой, спасая ваше королевство и семью!

SE.description: Discover the origins of the Fire Emblem saga! As young hero Marth, you must reclaim your stolen homeland and save your sister from the evil forces of Medeus. Fire Emblem™: Shadow Dragon is an enhanced Nintendo DS™ remake of the original Fire Emblem for Famicom™, previously released only in Japan. Assemble an army and plot your strategy in turn-based battles, taking into consideration the terrain, unit strengths and weaknesses, to defeat enemy forces.
